name: Software Engineering, BSc
description: I did an engineering-infused computer science programme at Budapest's best technical university.

thesis.title: Windows 8 application development
thesis.description: I developed a GPS based note-taking application for the newly opened Windows 8 modern platform.

name: Software Engineering, MSc
description: I followed up with a Master's in the same theme, putting focus on higher level computer software knowledge and spectrum widening courses.

thesis.title: Game development in Typescript using WebGL
thesis.description: While exploring typescript and WebGL, I developed a lame 3D platformer game, where players race with animal avatars in a procedurally generated ravine collecting LSD-inspired candy. The game is a real-time, non-centralized multiplayer game, that uses WebGL, and communicates through a node.js relay server.

name: Business Information Systems, BSc
description: Continuing the remainder of the programme after a year's hiatus because of work and the MSc.

thesis.title: Portfolio optimization algorithms
thesis.description: Acquiring, parsing stock data. Training naive strategies to predict stock price movement with back-testing. All components were implemented by me.

name: Programming Basics (C, C++) course

name: Javascript course

Managing E2E responsibility of applcation features, from design through deployment to monitoring. Advocating testing, static types, functional programming, and maintainable code.

name: Klarna
